title: How to write a good 30-page paper in one week - Quora

response.answer_text: The challenge isn’t writing 30 pages a week, the challenge is writing 30 good pages. One way to make it easier is to use a bigger font and triple space. Blank spaces after chapter breaks is another way. Realistically, one can write 2,000 words a day, especially if you have a good outline. That would give you about 14,000 words. My best advice is outline on day one, and plot exactly what you plan to write in the next six days.
